extension.name: CiviBooking
extension.description: A CMS independent extension to allow organisations to manage a group of resources (i.e. rooms) offering these to constituents for a fee.
extension.license: the GNU Affero General Public License 3 (GNU AGPL 3) and the CiviCRM Licensing Exception.

maintainer.author: Matthew Wire, Erawat Chamanont, Jamie Novick, Guanhuan Chen
